document_data.name: ''Silverleaf Hatchet''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Silverleaf hatchet''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[axe]] created in the glory days of the City of Song, [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: The ''Silverleaf hatchet'' was created with a distinctly dwarven shape and design. The axe's head was [[silver]]-plated.
document_data.Powers: The weapon carried a simple ''+2'' enchantment, however, when wielded against [[orc]]s and [[orog]]s, it became functionally an enchanted ''+3'' axe. Additionally, when battling orcs and orogs, the hatchet magically improved the wielder's defenses, similarly to a ''+1'' enchantment.
document_data.History: The axe was created by the dwarven smiths and enchanters of Myth Drannor, before the city's destruction in the [[Weeping War]] in [[714 DR]]. By the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the ''Silverleaf hatchet'', along with its sister weapon, the ''[[Silverleaf rod]]'', fell into the scaly hands of [[lizardfolk]], led by a mysterious [[sorcerer]] named [[Malgi Hi]] who laired in tunnels of the [[Dwarven Dungeons]].
